holidays.title: Benito Juarez Day
holidays.description: Remember and celebrate the exploits of Mexican icon Benito Juárez on his birthday memorial day.

holidays.title: Camp Fire Girls day
holidays.description: Camp Fire Girls Day is celebrated to commemorate the founding of Camp Fire.

holidays.title: Doctor Patient Trust Day
holidays.description: Let us understand the importance of doctor-patient trust and how to create a better relationship.

holidays.title: Evacuation Day
holidays.description: Dive into the annals of American military history and learn how the colonists routed the redcoats.

holidays.title: Evacuation Day in Boston
holidays.description: We’re a little jealous of all the Bay Staters who get Evacuation Day off today!

holidays.title: National Corned Beef and Cabbage Day
holidays.description: Beef in brine and sliced crunchy cabbage, this day is here to stay!

holidays.title: Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Day
holidays.description: Dive into the history of the Philippines’ most idolized politician — the people’s President Ramon Magsaysay.

holidays.title: Saint Gertrude of Nivelles Day
holidays.description: Travelers, recently deceased, rodents, and now, cats, join us, as we explore more about Saint Gertrude.

holidays.title: Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Birthday
holidays.description: Sheikh Mujibur Rahman is one of the most respected leaders in the history of Bangladesh.

holidays.title: Wellderly Day
holidays.description: This Wellderly Day, re-examine what 'old' means and continue living life to the fullest!

holidays.title: St. Patrick's Day
holidays.description: Leprechauns, pots of gold, and a whole lot of green!

holidays.title: Alev Aydin’s Birthday
holidays.description: His seeds of inspiration are growing stronger as a father and a professional filmmaker.

holidays.title: Dwight Eubanks’s Birthday
holidays.description: Atlanta's International ‘Man of Style’ has taken center stage, and no one can match him.

holidays.title: Grimes’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented, beautiful, and creative musician has always been a heavy hitter.

holidays.title: Haley Cureton’s Birthday
holidays.description: This upcoming social media star has always been a very hardworking person.

holidays.title: Hannah Dasher’s Birthday
holidays.description: This notable and vivacious country singer is the girl we should all look out for!

holidays.title: Hozier’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hozier is a talented musician who has garnered critical acclaim around the world.

holidays.title: Kurt Russell’s Birthday
holidays.description: For Kurt Russell, finding the fun in one's work is the key to enjoying life.

holidays.title: Nicky Jam’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nicky Jam has graced the world with numerous hits throughout the past decades.

holidays.title: Rob Lowe’s Birthday
holidays.description: This versatile actor-director has always been persistent and diligent in his work.

holidays.title: Sean Price’s Birthday
holidays.description: Sean Price was one of the greatest rappers and he left behind a rich musical legacy.

holidays.title: Tamar Braxton’s Birthday
holidays.description: This celebrated singer and musician has always been dedicated to her work!
